price: 49. Dus toen hij zich van hen afkeerde en van diegenen die zij naast Allah aanbaden. Gaven Wij hem Isaac en Yacoeb en ieder van hen maakten Wij tot profeet.
arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: falammā iʿ'tazalahum wamā yaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi wahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wakullan jaʿalnā nabiyyan
